title: Close to RTD-stops & park and light rail, Garbage Disposal
posting_body: Cherry Ridge Apartments in Aurora , CO
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 550 Sq.
Come see why we are so popular!
Our spacious, well designed apartment homes have all electric kitchens stove, refrigerators, dishwashers, disposals, All homes have wall to wall carpet, window coverings and lots of closet space.
Select units have balconies and air conditioning units!
Our community features a huge heated indoor pool , sparkilng outdoor pool, Play ground, fitness Center and a great central Aurora location!
We also have laundry facilities, internet cafe and lots of off street parking.
Cherry Ridge is also located in the Cherry Creek school district.
Visit us today and find out why Cherry Ridge is a very special place to live!
- Close to RTD-stops & park and light rail
Pet Friendly (up to 2 pets 60 lbs or less combined)
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
